description: An AI agent is tasked with optimizing the yield of a specific semiconductor manufacturing process. This involves analyzing sensor data from the fabrication plant and suggesting adjustments to process parameters. The AI should operate within defined constraints and report its progress regularly.
initial_goal: Maximize the yield of the 7nm FinFET process within the next quarter while minimizing material waste and maintaining quality control standards.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a 7nm FinFET fabrication process in a high-volume production environment)
